summary: Professor Thurber loves to teach, but can't stand all the politicking. So when his opportunity for tenure is announced, he goes out on a limb to prove his worth, but unexpectedly falls in love with the girl who might replace him.
cast: Luke Wilson|Gretchen Mol|David Koechner|Sasha Alexander|Bob Gunton|Rosemarie DeWitt|Michael Cudlitz|William Bogert|Andrew Daly|Ellen Tobie|Zach Selwyn|Hilary Pingle|Nathan Pham|Van Hughes|Lily Holleman|Robert Farrior|Paul Rescigno|Robbie Rescigno|Lyman Chen|Keith Adams|Jenn An|Robert Fazio|Richard Graves|Nina Hodoruk|Atif Lanier|Anne Lewis|John McKeever|Jeffrey Mowery|Joshua Ryan|Kimberly Whittaker|John Wooten|Damon Zarro|Frank Apollonio|Anthony Keating|Basil Kershner|Drew McAuliffe|Tom McNutt|Stefan Niemczyk|Will Souders|Jared Uhrich|Gabriel Valentino|David Von Roehm
title: Tenure
